mods.note: DPJiZP LBTgER. b n.o. ^7. Edward. Sinclair, , D/JX 168192 , 11^ 1« ^ -• 1'iC »-j 3, R.N- B.arra.ck3, Devonporb. Sir, 3 0 '' '94f In reply to your letter to the Colonial Office of the 19th July, regarding the mine and address of the oil company at Bahrain in the Persian Gulf, I am directed to inform you that the oil wells at Bahrain are operated hy the Bahrain Petroleum Compary Limited. The Company’s address in Great Britain is:- Bahrain Petroleum Cori^any, Limited, Cliffords Inn, Fleet Street, London, 3. C. ^ r?- .

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 4180/43 'Inquiry re name and address of oil co at Bahrein (B.P.Co).'

physicalDescription.extent: The file's contents are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 7; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file consists primarily of letters between the Colonial Office and Edward Sinclair regarding Sinclair’s request for the address of the Bahrain Petroleum Company Limited in the Persian Gulf.
